verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Speak <WH1696> unto<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and take<WH3947> of<WH4480> <WH854> every one of them a rod<WH4294> according to the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> of<WH4480> <WH854> all<WH3605> their princes<WH5387> according to the house<WH1004> of their fathers<WH1> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> rods:<WH4294> write<WH3789> thou<WH853> every man's<WH376> name<WH8034> upon<WH5921> his rod.<WH4294>

And thou shalt write<WH3789> Aaron's<WH175> name<WH8034> upon<WH5921> the rod<WH4294> of Levi:<WH3878> for<WH3588> one<WH259> rod<WH4294> shall be for the head<WH7218> of the house<WH1004> of their fathers.<WH1>
And thou shalt lay them up<WH5117> in the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> before<WH6440> the testimony,<WH5715> where<WH834> <WH8033> I will meet<WH3259> with you.

And it shall come to pass,<WH1961> that the man's<WH376> rod,<WH4294> whom<WH834> I shall choose,<WH977> shall blossom:<WH6524> and I will make to cease<WH7918> from<WH4480> <WH5921> me<WH853> the murmurings<WH8519> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> whereby<WH834> they<WH1992> murmur<WH3885> against<WH5921> you.

And Moses<WH4872> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and every one<WH3605> of their princes<WH5387> gave<WH5414> <WH413> him a rod<WH4294> apiece,<WH5387> <WH259> <WH4294> for each prince<WH5387> one,<WH259> according to their fathers'<WH1> houses,<WH1004> even twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> rods:<WH4294> and the rod<WH4294> of Aaron<WH175> was among<WH8432> their rods.<WH4294>
And Moses<WH4872> laid up<WH5117> <WH853> the rods<WH4294> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> in the tabernacle<WH168> of witness.<WH5715>

And it came to pass,<WH1961> that on the morrow<WH4480> <WH4283> Moses<WH4872> went<WH935> into<WH413> the tabernacle<WH168> of witness;<WH5715> and, behold,<WH2009> the rod<WH4294> of Aaron<WH175> for the house<WH1004> of Levi<WH3878> was budded,<WH6524> and brought forth<WH3318> buds,<WH6525> and bloomed<WH6692> blossoms,<WH6731> and yielded<WH1580> almonds.<WH8247>

And Moses<WH4872> brought out<WH3318> <WH853> all<WH3605> the rods<WH4294> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> unto<WH413> all<WH3605> the children<WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478> and they looked,<WH7200> and took<WH3947> every man<WH376> his rod.<WH4294>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> Bring<WH7725> <WH853> Aaron's<WH175> rod<WH4294> again before<WH6440> the testimony,<WH5715> to be kept<WH4931> for a token<WH226> against the rebels;<WH1121> <WH4805> and thou shalt quite take away<WH3615> their murmurings<WH8519> from<WH4480> <WH5921> me, that they die<WH4191> not.<WH3808>
And Moses<WH4872> did<WH6213> so: as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> him, so<WH3651> did<WH6213> he.
And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> spoke<WH559> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559> Behold,<WH2005> we die,<WH1478> we perish,<WH6> we all<WH3605> perish.<WH6>
Whosoever <WH3605> cometh any thing near<WH7131> <WH7131> unto<WH413> the tabernacle<WH4908> of the LORD<WH3068> shall die:<WH4191> shall we be consumed<WH8552> with dying?<WH1478>
